channel.title: Qubes 4.0 whonix wallet issues & other
channel.description:
The latest electrum from their website will not install using the download instructions provided, does anyone know a walk around?
Monero wallet cli will not ruin at all either is there any reason for this? I have tested monero on a whonix machine running vb and it ran straight away, leading me to believe it's a qubes issue.
Finally on 3.2 if i wanted to install a web-server for whonix I would wget nginx onto the whonix-ws template, install it from source and every other whonix would have access to it.
whonix-ws will not allow wget do I need to change the network on it to sys-whonix and try again before turning it back?

item.title: Qubes 4.0 whonix wallet issues & other
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
wendyface:

The latest electrum from their website will not install using the download instructions provided, does anyone know a walk around?

  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Install_Software#Avoid_Third_Party_Package_Managers

  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Install_Software#Avoid_Manual_Software_Installation

  • Don’t install in TemplateVM.

  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Software#Install_Software_in_TemplateBasedVM

Monero wallet cli will not ruin at all either is there any reason for this? I have tested monero on a whonix machine running vb and it ran straight away, leading me to believe it’s a qubes issue.

Why run monero wallet cli in TemplateVM?

Finally on 3.2 if i wanted to install a web-server for whonix I would wget nginx onto the whonix-ws template, install it from source and every other whonix would have access to it.

Whonix

Onion Services

Anonymously host any server with Whonix and Tor onion services

sudo apt-get install nginx

?

whonix-ws will not allow wget do I need to change the network on it to sys-whonix and try again before turning it back?

No. Figure out how to connect through Qubes updates proxy if you must.

R4:

http_proxy=http://127.0.0.1:8082 curl.anondist-orig https://check.torproject.org

Does that work?

Whonix

Secure Downloads

How to safely download files. How to defeat web encryption stripping attacks (sslstrip).

Read full topic

item.title: Qubes 4.0 whonix wallet issues & other
item.dc:creator: wendyface
item.description:
The latest electrum from their website will not install using the download instructions provided, does anyone know a walk around?

Monero wallet cli will not ruin at all either is there any reason for this? I have tested monero on a whonix machine running vb and it ran straight away, leading me to believe it’s a qubes issue.

Finally on 3.2 if i wanted to install a web-server for whonix I would wget nginx onto the whonix-ws template, install it from source and every other whonix would have access to it.

whonix-ws will not allow wget do I need to change the network on it to sys-whonix and try again before turning it back?

Read full topic
